fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.task

Interface Task

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GLDisplayable, TextureTask<TextureType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDisplayable, AbstractTask, AbstractTextureTask, AtomicAbstractTask, BasicTextureTask, BinaryGradientImageTask, DisplayableCurve, DisplayablePoint, DisplayableSurface, GradientTextureTask, PerlinNoiseTextureTask, PreloadTask, TileDistributionTextureTask

    public interface Task
extends Runnable
    Author:
    JeT A task is an asynchronous process which has some properties: - a name - its progress value can be followed between 0 and 1 - task can be paused or stopped
